display.title: Sentinel Plating - Armor
display.description: When wearing a full set of armor trimmed with this Pattern gain bonuses when protecting Villagers, in the pressence of Vindicators increase Resistance, in the pressence of Pillagers increase Strength, in the pressence of Evokers increase Speed and in the pressence of Ravagers increase Haste. Ominous Banners are also converted to Hero fo the Village
